class.name: myactuator_hardware/MultiMotorHardwareInterface
class.description: Multi-motor hardware interface for MyActuator RMD series. Supports multiple motors on a single CAN bus with position, velocity, and effort control. Designed for use with MoveIt2 and JointTrajectoryController.

class.name: myactuator_hardware/TorqueHardwareInterface
class.description: Torque (current) control hardware interface for MyActuator RMD series. Direct torque control with minimal latency for real-time applications.
